name: Gleepost
overview: Gleepost, an online notice board or classifieds which is tailored for university communities, enables university students to exclusively post classified ads to reach their fellow colleagues. Gleepost organizes users into networks based on the university they attend, and gives users the ability to confine their ads to their network. Students can sign up, using their university email address, and post ads selling anything from used textbooks to old cellphones, or ads promoting events or even ads looking for other students to share a house with. Gleepost is tailored for the university experience and offers classified categories which are especially useful for university communities as well as the generic classified categories. Since the site launched (only for Leeds university) in late April 2012, the site has signed up hundreds of students posting dozens of of ads. Our goal as a company is simply to eliminate many of the challenges we experience as university students, giving each student the ability to make useful connections with their colleagues.
